home.welcome: I'm Masha, and I'm a web-developer

about.title: About me
about.text-one: Currently, the Internet is the most demanded way of promoting and advertising a company. The company's website is a presentation of its presence on the web for customers, a business card that cannot be lost.
about.text-two: I create sites of small volume, consisting of one or more pages, or site-catalogue with information about the products of the company, with adaptation for mobile devices, place on the Internet and set up a search for Yandex and Google. Always in touch, result-oriented, working through all the details.
about.text-three: I have programming skills such as HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, GSAP, Figma, JavaScript, React, Redux, GitHub and I'm currently finishing learning Node.JS and have some experience in a digital studio where I have mastered Vue.js, Vuex, Nuxt, Quasar, Vuetify.
